title: Production of titanium dioxide worldwide by country share 2014
summary: As of 2014 , China was home to the largest Percentage of global any Country with 19 percentage production .
That year , the Australia and South_Africa were second and third in the list , with over 148 and 15 percentage production respectively .
Global overview There were about 677.6 percentage global dioxide as of 2014 , meaning that China was home to more than half of the global population .
gold: This statistic illustrates the distribution of global titanium dioxide ( mineral sands ) production in 2014 , by country . Australia , China , and South Africa were the leading producers with 17 , 18 , and 15 percent , respectively . Titanium dioxide is one of the two core product streams of the mineral sands industry .
